overview: Framework-free JavaScript powering interactive healthcare website features including theme toggling, back-to-top behavior, analytics logging, and a debug panel for event inspection.
interactions: Click theme toggle to switch between light and dark modes
Keyboard activation of theme toggle via Enter or Space
Scroll triggers visibility of back-to-top button
Click back-to-top button to smooth scroll to top
routes: No explicit routes; operates on single-page frontend behaviors
data_flow: Theme preference stored and retrieved from localStorage
Analytics events appended to window.analyticsLog array
Debug panel reads last 20 analytics events for display
Scroll position determines back-to-top button visibility
accessibility: Theme toggle includes keyboard support (Enter, Space)
Reduced motion respected via prefers-reduced-motion media query
Back-to-top button visibility and focus should be tested for screen readers
analytics: logAnalytics(type, payload) pushes events to window.analyticsLog
theme_toggle event logged with selected theme
test_ideas: Verify theme toggle updates data-theme attribute and localStorage value
Ensure theme toggle is keyboard accessible
Confirm back-to-top button visibility toggles after scrolling past threshold
Validate smooth scroll behavior respects reduced motion setting
Trigger Ctrl+Shift+D and confirm debug panel displays recent analytics events
Check analyticsLog entries for correct event type and timestamp format
Simulate multiple theme toggles and verify analytics event count and payload accuracy
